job.title: Software Engineer - Platform
job.description: Quadric is building a fullstack system that is designed to meet the requirements of nextgeneration edge amp edgecloud computing products In order to leverage the tsunami of data generated at the Edge the next generation of computing innovation is happening outside the data center Quadric has created a solution that is specifically optimized not only for Artificial Intelligence AI workloads but also for Image Processing Data Analytics and morebrbrIf making an impact and having a seat at the table is important to you this is the opportunity for you Join our small rapidlygrowing team at Quadric to develop supercomputer technology designed for the Edge In this position you will be a core member of our team and will have an opportunity to grow in the company of expert technologists who also happen to be good people youll want to spend time withbrbrstrongWhat We ValuebrbrstrongIntegrity Humility HappinessbrbrstrongWhat We ExpectbrbrstrongInitiative Collaboration CompletionbrbrRolebrbrAs a member of our platform software engineering team you will be tasked with taking in customer requirements and breaking them into actionable items and executing them with the team Work with SW and HW engineers to build our quadric ecosystem with easy to use front end APIs which map efficiently to the hardwarebrbrstrongRequirementsbrstrongulliContribute to the development of cutting edge deep neural networks computer vision and DSP algorithms using Quadrics technologyliliCollaborate within the software team to define the C programming model for the Quadric processorliliCollaborate with the system design team to define an application programming interface API for highperformance applicationsliliContribute to the development of an architectural simulator for rapid prototyping amp exploration of algorithm spacebrbrliulRequirementsbrulliProficiency in C gt 11liliKnowledge of both classical Compute Vision and Neural Network algorithmsliliData structures OOPS concepts computer architecture operating systems and multithreaded programmingbrbrliulNice to havesbrulliExperience with programming in openCV andor OpenCLCUDAbrbrliulFounded in 2016 and based in downtown Burlingame California Quadric is building the worlds first supercomputer designed for the realtime needs of edge devices Quadric aims to empower developers in every industry with superpowers to create tomorrows technology today The company was cofounded by technologists from MIT and Carnegie Mellon who were previously the technical cofounders of the Bitcoin computing company 21brbremQuadric is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race religion sex national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status or disabilitybrbremstrongBenefitsbrstrongulliProvide competitive salaries and meaningful equityliliProvide a politics free community for the brilliant minds who want to make an immediate impactliliProvide an opportunity for you to build long term career relationshipsliliFoster an environment that allows for lasting personal relationships alongside
